column4: hi, I am trying to install sun-j2re on breezy , but for some reason the pkg remains listed as virtual. I have enabled universe,multiverse, backports, and all that I could find in the /etc/apt.sources.list and ran the update . What else should I do ?
go to java site and click on manual install, their guide is very good
yes, that's one way, but it shows up as a pkg. Secondly, it is not the only pkg that has that issue.
virtual packages are packages that some other package lists as a dependency but the package doesn't actually exist
